name: Tribute to Lola
description:
Lola was young 12 years old little girl who was brutally killed by an Algerian woman named Dahbia, who was under an obligation to leave the french territory. Lola has been raped, killed, dismembered and put in a suitcase and throw to the garbage by the woman.

The streamer Kroc Blanc, helped by the french napoleonian community (r/NapoleonFR), created this tribute for Lola, but were highly contested by left-wing parties, because the family don't wants the death of their child instrumentalized by extremist Right wing Partys.
